Service Details: - The Terry Fox Foundation's mission is to maintain the principles of Terry Fox while raising money for cancer research through the annual Terry Fox Run, memoriam donations and planned gifts and to celebrate Terry's legacy to help keep his dream of a cure for cancer alive- This is a completely volunteer driven event with 84 cents of every dollar raised going directly to cancer research- This non-competitive event is for individuals, families and groups- No entry fee and no minimum donation for participants- Participants can choose route length and choice of walk, run or ride- Volunteer opportunities available
Cost: No entry fee and no minimum donation.
Address & Map: 2669 Shaughnessy StPort Coquitlam, BC     V3C 3G7View MapQuest Map
